sentence: In July, House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy nominated Nehls to the Jan. 6 committee, along with Reps. Jim Jordan (R-OH), Rodney Davis (R-IL), Kelly Armstrong (R-ND), and Jim Banks (R-IN).
author: Roger Sollenberger
title: GOP Rep. Claims Capitol Police Secretly Broke Into His Office

sentence: https://t.co/TZDSTI5Oq0 — Olivia Beavers (@Olivia_Beavers) October 26, 2021 Nehls never had his shot on the Jan. 6 committee because McCarthy ultimately withdrew his name and every other Republican he proposed for the panel after Speaker Pelosi rejected two of his selections: Rep. Jim Jordan of Ohio and Jim Banks of Indiana.
title: Texas Republican and Trump ally accuses Capitol Police of snooping through his office

sentence: His nomination was withdrawn in protest by McCarthy after House Speaker Nancy Pelosi objected to Donald Trump allies Reps. Jim Jordan and Jim Banks being on the panel.
author: Elizabeth Elkind
title: Republican Rep. Troy Nehls claims Capitol Police disguised as construction workers snuck into his office to take photos of his files after he was picked for the GOP panel to investigate January 6 'security failures'

sentence: He was an original member of the Jan. 6 select committee, but Republicans decided not to participate after Pelosi refused to seat Reps. Jim Jordan and Jim Banks.
author: Terresa Monroe-Hamilton
title: Fuming GOP rep accuses Capitol Police of ‘illegally’ investigating his office, says staffer ‘caught them in the act’

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) has said "we need to get to the truth" after another GOP lawmaker claimed the U.S. Capitol Police had been spying on him.
author: Ewan Palmer
title: Jim Jordan Says We Must 'Get to the Truth' Over Capitol Police Spying Claim

sentence: The members include longtime allies to former President Donald Trump Reps. Jim Jordan of Ohio, Jim Banks of Indiana, Rodney Davis of Illinois, Kelly Armstrong of North Dakota, and Troy Nehls of Texas.

sentence: But his nomination was also accompanied by McCarthy’s picks, Reps. Jim Jordan of Ohio and Jim Banks of Indiana.

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) summed it up like this: “Joe Biden and the Democrats have literally messed up every single thing they tried to do.” The bigger message though?

sentence: Trump said he remembered talking to House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy, R-Calif., Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, and other people during that period.
